name: Limit Login Attempts Security
author: Wpdodev

sections.description:
A lightweight version that support GeoLocation for login security. Use GeoLocation (Country/City setting).

For more features, please try this free plugin: https://wordpress.org/plugins/dologin/

Features:

  • Support GeoLocation IP limit
  • Support IP whitelist/blacklist
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

Readme updated.

1.0.1

  • Updated Geo API.
  • Recommended an more advanced Login Security plugin.

short_description: A lightweight version of DoLogin with GeoLocation for login security only. For the full features, please use this free plugin: https://wordpress.
